dmca.title: Wood Door Studio Slams VVG
dmca.body:
Chiang Mai, Thailand: Sunday, 13 February 2005

Google Inc
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043 USA
[private]
Email: [private]
Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints

Re: [#19972540] Copyright Violation [KrokosC] 
Dear Google,

Thank you for the mail...

> Please send us the URLs of the pages from the offending site that are
> allegedly infringing on your copyright.

Offending sites www.vvg-vietnam.com, www.vvg-thailand.com current pages are located at:

http://www.vvg-vietnam.com/doorthings-2.htm 
http://www.vvg-thailand.com/doorthings-2.htm 
http://www.vvg-vietnam.com/doorthings-1.htm 
http://www.vvg-thailand.com/doorthings-1.htm 
http://www.vvg-vietnam.com/doors_1.htm 
http://www.vvg-vietnam.com/doors_2.htm 
http://www.vvg-vietnam.com/doors_3.htm 
http://www.vvg-vietnam.com/doors_4.htm 
http://www.vvg-thailand.com/doors_1.htm 
http://www.vvg-thailand.com/doors_2.htm 
http://www.vvg-thailand.com/doors_3.htm 
http://www.vvg-thailand.com/doors_4.htm

Previously above pages were here, see below. When I personally asked the offending site's owner to remove infringing copyright material he changed the url address of the following pages...

http://www.vvg-vietnam.com/door_mfg_details.htm 
http://www.vvg-thailand.com/door_mfg_details.htm 
http://www.vvg-vietnam.com/door_define_terms.htm 
http://www.vvg-thailand.com/door_define_terms.htm

> We will not remove pages for duplicate or offensive content. You do
> not have to provide them on CD-ROM.

Understood, thank you...

> Please also just send us the URLs from the pages on your site where
> we can find the copyright material that has been used on the
> offending site.

Below is my site www.the-wood.com from where copyright material is used:

http://www.the-wood.com/specifications.htm 
http://www.the-wood.com/glossary.htm
http://www.the-wood.com/teak-doors.htm 
http://www.the-wood.com/round-top-doors.htm

> We do not need your files or blueprints. 
Understood...
> Please provide us with your email address and postal address for
> contact information. Finally, we need a signature on the document.
> Please let us know if you have any further questions or concerns.

My signature, email address and postal address are below...

> Provide information, if possible, sufficient to permit Google to
> notify the owner/administrator of the webpage that allegedly contains
> infringing material (email address is preferred).

Contact information of the owner/administrator of the webpage that allegedly contains infringing material below...

[Private]
[Private]
Rim Tai, Mae Rim
Chiang Mai, 50180 Thailand 
Cell:  [private]
Tel:   [private]
Fax:   [private]
Email: [private] 
Email:[private] 
http://www.vvg-vietnam.com/ 
http://www.vvg-thailand.com/

I have a good faith and belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web-pages is not authorized by me, the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in this notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

With Kind Regards,

[private]
Chiang Mai 50220 Thailand
Cell: [private]
Tel/Fax: [private]
E-mail: [private]
http://www.the-wood.com/
